data.submit: Load the environment and/or apply facet and filter settings.

search.submit: Compute the location of these sequences on the map.

toolbar.sync: Toggle synchronised navigation and selections. If enabled, reports will include all subplots, otherwise only the selected subplot will be included.
toolbar.selectDraw: Toggle draw mode. Hold the mouse button to draw a selection and release at any point to finish. Click inside the area to load a report.
